ygData.subject: Re: General Tinkering Info
ygData.msgSnippet: Diamond dust is dropped by fairy guards ... From: Lomack  To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com  Date: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Diamond dust is dropped by fairy guards
-----Original Message-----
From: Lomack <lomack@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, November 11, 1999 2:09 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] General Tinkering Info


>From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
>Hi all,
>
>I have been a member of this list for some time now, just waiting, reading,
>and hoping for the day that tinkering would become useful. Well I decided
>when these aqualungs and rebreathers came out to give it a shot. Here is
>my story
>
>Day 1: Invested 750plat into tinkering and got to 75 skill
>Day 2: Invested another 750plat and got to 85 skill.
>Day 3: Invested 1400plat and got my skill to 102.
>Day 3: Invested 1000plat in aqualungs, 4 attempts, 2 successes.
>
>As updated information for the website
>The spyglass trivilas at 101. it wasn't trivial at 100 (I checked)
>The Stalking Probes Trivial out at 102.
>
>Unless the Gemcutter comes through somehow (assuming someone finds out
>where diamond dust can be found, only aqualungs can raise my skill any
further.
>
>I haven't sold any yet, but I am hopeing to get between 600 and 750 plat
>for them. I don't see much of a market for them as Shamen, Druids, and
>Enchanters all can cast the Enduring Breath spell.
>Just as a note of the 3900plat I have spent, a good chunk of it came from
>members of my guild. Even at level 42 I just don't have this kind of money
>kicking around.
>
>With the help of friendly enchanters and a Crude Stine I try to get the
>best prices. Current Relavent stats are
>Wisdom: 88
>Intiligence: 187
>Charisma: 75 (87-110) (buffed)
>
>If I had truely known it was going to be this expensive, I may not have
>started the task, but once I took the first donation from my guildmates I
>had no choice but to continue. So if anyone wants aqualungs on Fennin Ro,
>just look me up. I am shooting for 750pp each to the public, but if you
>tell me you read it here I will go as low as 600. With a 50% succes rate I
>just can't go any lower and still hope to break try to break even.
>
>Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
>Master of Recruiting
>www.bck.org
>"The Crimson Knights"
>Fennin Ro
>
>
